TopicTitle: Could anyone make a replica for me?

Articles.Content:
The car I'm thinking about is maybe one of those corvettes (I'm not talking about the boats; I mean the car) that are used for the races OR an Indycar replica. If you could, please send me one?

Edited June 15, 2017 by DarkOwl57
Have you looked at some of Azimech's stuff? He makes some very nice mid-cold war cars (ford pinto kinda stuff)
